TopicTitle: BobCat Ind. - Colonization, exploring and research vehicle

Articles.Content:
Maybe Bobcat should make a green Soyuz

I don't understand what you're asking.

Wow, I can't wait for the DEMV MKII

Maybe Bobcat should make a green Soyuz

I thought it was already green?

I personally hope they keep HOME 1 because it suits my needs for a First Stage colony, which is just a series of buildings to scout out locations to lay down the actual bases, and they also serve as great landers for extended stay landers/temporary settlements for interplanetary missions.

I don't understand what you're asking.
I thought it was already green?

It was a joke, the backup is from before bobcat had started working on Soyuz (I think).

And look where we are now, Kliper!

Let me just say - I have the DEMV Mks 1, 2, and 4. The first two are wonderful utility vehicles. Especially the Mk 2.

But for sheer fun, I absolutely LOVE the DEMV Mk 4. It's the "Sportscar" of the lot.

One of the great things about it is that the profile is low enough to be carried under the truss of Wayland's Eagle mod.

Making it a natural choice for short and medium range scouting around or transport of Kerbals when you don't want to use the resources of an Eagle or other ship.

The DROP pod option and the fuel/rocket engines remind me of the Mako from the first Mass Effect game.

And what other vehicle lets you get away with stunts like THIS!? ---

That's some SERIOUS AIR we're talkin' about, here! (Okay - serious VACUUM in this case. But you get the idea...)

My compliments, guys. You've seriously brought the FahrvergnÃƒÂ¼gen to the KSP driving experience!

Edited April 19, 2013 by Logan.Darklighter
Cut down on redundant images

@Logan.Darklighter

That's an awful lot of screenshots of the same thing. I get that you're showing your appreciation, but could you trim it down to just a couple images? It's a lot to scroll through.

EDIT: GRRRR... Okay, getting rid of effective duplicate post. *KICKS FORUMS*

Wow... This is a far rollback. I went from 200 posts to 5.

Anyways, thank you BobCat! The Kliper is awesome!

*stumbles into the thread covered in soot, dirt and debris* This past week has been hell, both on and offline... X.x I got a message from BobCat the other day saying something about fixing the Cassowary's control issues. I'm not sure though, it's sometimes hard to understand his broken english

Did you guys try making the wingtip vertical stabilizers a separate piece with a control surface on it? I remember during the livestream (in February/March) that was an idea being thrown around.

Did you guys try making the wingtip vertical stabilizers a separate piece with a control surface on it? I remember during the livestream (in February/March) that was an idea being thrown around.

He didn't specify, the email only said "IM FIX Cassowary. LOL"

Not sure if cryptic or trolly ~<3

Im really fix that. Need make a lot work, but im fix 5 main problem )).

Its most hard plane in my hand.
Hmm the Hercules looks really interesting.any plans to still do that one?

IM FIX Cassowary. LOL

Hmm the Hercules looks really interesting.any plans to still do that one?

aww. no plans for Hercules? looks like an awesome vehicle!

aww. no plans for Hercules? looks like an awesome vehicle!
